definition: baijiu, a spirit usually distilled from sorghum

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Maotai is the most famous baijiu brand in China.
sentences.chinese: 茅台是中国最知名的白酒品牌。

sentences.english: It tastes like rancid fish steeped in gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 白酒的味道就像泡着腐鱼的汽油。

sentences.english: The produced liquor has strong aroma and belongs to health wine.
sentences.chinese: 所生产白酒酒味浓香，属于保健酒。

sentences.english: Uptight men drink alcohol and invade another country.
sentences.chinese: 紧张的男人喝白酒，入侵别国。

sentences.english: Red wine contains more resveratrol than white wine.
sentences.chinese: 红酒含有比白酒更多的白藜醇。

sentences.english: Methods The model of alcoholic hepatic disorder was established by feeding alcohol liquor.
sentences.chinese: 方法白酒灌胃法建立酒精性肝病大鼠模型。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, dad, I never drink spirit even if I am from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 爹地，说老实话，虽然是东北人，可我从来不喝白酒。

sentences.english: Both of us were drunk on something more than the bottle of soju.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都醉了，不仅仅因这那瓶韩国白酒。

sentences.english: Some people add them to soups, teas and wine.
sentences.chinese: 还有人喜欢加枸杞到汤，茶或者是白酒中。

sentences.english: Add white wine to deglaze, then chicken bones, herb stems &water to cover.
sentences.chinese: 加少许白酒，然后放进鸡骨，香料和水盖锅。

sentences.english: The core procedure in the production of Site-flavour liquor is blending.
sentences.chinese: 特型白酒生产的核心部分是勾兑。

sentences.english: Most scholars claim daily drink no more than 60 degrees liquor 25 ml.
sentences.chinese: 多数学者主张每日饮60度白酒不超过25毫升。

sentences.english: The color, odor and taste of the ultrafiltration low grade wine are better than that of the uncleared.
sentences.chinese: 超滤白酒的透明度，口味物优于未超滤的酒。

sentences.english: Heng Shui Laobaigan is one of the most famous liquors in Hebei province and never goes to the head.
sentences.chinese: 衡水老白干是河北省最有名的白酒，而且喝了不上头。

sentences.english: The whole liquor-making industry consumers have to meet the personalized needs of congenital conditions.
sentences.chinese: 整个白酒业具有满足消费者个性化需求的先天条件。

sentences.english: The development of liquor blending techniques was a great achievement in liquor production.
sentences.chinese: 勾调技术的发展是白酒生产技术的重大成就。

definition: "yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
Jiugui Liquor, liquor company from 吉首[Ji2 shou3]
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
